Release LTS.460.5 of June 18, 2025
New features
Now, when creating an
object type
or an
attribute
, the table/field name is generated automatically by the System.
It is now possible to display a file thumbnail in the registry column
settings
.
Filtering can now be configured in the extended version of the Kanban board.
It is now possible to create object chat using an algorithm.
In addition, functions for chat administration were added: adding/excluding users, setting up roles, assigning/removing the administrator role.
Forced stopping of ETL processes is now performed only with an appropriate
permission
.
It is now possible to select a text fragment in the document by holding
Shift
and clicking with the mouse.
Changes and improvements
To ensure unified terminology, the "Messages" menu item and "Dialogs" panel were renamed to "Chats".
When working with an object type configured with permissions by condition tree, it is now possible to view users editing the object profile.
The modal window behavior for closing unsaved objects using the keyboard was improved.
The link functionality in pop-up notifications was restored.
The operation of
object lifecycle events
was debugged.
The process of adding
object tags
was stabilized.
Object saving when editing the value of a chained attribute was improved.
The ability to copy the value of a "Text" type attribute using an algorithm was stabilized.
Changing the value of a boolean attribute using a custom action algorithm was improved.
Data retention
when closing an object profile without saving was optimized.
In the modal window for configuring "String" and "Text" attributes, the parameter for maximum length was renamed to "Size, characters".
The attachment of files to the file attribute was debugged.
The logic for transferring the registry along with control panel button settings with "Default for all registries" enabled using
updates
was improved.
Data filtering in the registry was improved.
Button settings in the control panel now prioritize the
object attribute visual
over the
registry panel button settings
.
The display of object attribute values when grouping in a registry with a virtual column was stabilized.
The
auto-refresh
of registry data when editing objects via business processes was improved.
Primitive object filtering in the registry was improved.
When working with the object registry located in a frame, the process of adding objects in edit mode was debugged.
When creating a new object instance, the first
tab
now displays correctly on the visual.
Default values were added for
"Image"
and
"Progress bar"
widgets.
The work of the
"Financial statements"
widget was debugged.
The widget size for
"Title by attribute"
is now saved according to the container on the
visual
.
Time-dependent attributes can now be locked using the
"Attribute table"
widget.
The generation of a
subject area
using AI was optimized.
Colored display and critical path viewing when working with the
Gantt chart
was improved.
The preservation of data formats when exporting
OLAP views
was improved.
The algorithm to automatically fill in the value when setting up the
"Control element"
analytical dashboard panel was restored.
The process of creating Kanban boards was debugged.
When setting up Kanban boards, the ability to select an attribute for dividing lanes into groups was debugged.
The signature placement algorithm in the
"Sign the file using a simple e-signature"
action was optimized.
Object opening via a custom action algorithm was enabled.
The execution of the
"Sign the file (CryptoPro)"
action was stabilized.
The operation of the
currentUser
function with chain attributes was stabilized.
The display of the modal window when calling the
objectsWithOptions
function was improved.
The
objects
and
objectsWithOptions
functions now accept the object type and tree/source/algorithm as a parameter (
param
), dictionary value (
dict
), or variable (
var
).
The creation of variables with names matching function names was restricted.
The tooltip display in the algorithm editor with
Ctrl
+
Space
was stabilized.
The
copyAndSave
function was optimized.
The
isNumber
function was improved.
Highlighting of incorrect links in the
data converter
dynamic structure was added.
The "Search for object in directory" transformer was improved.
The execution button for "Run ETL on files" is now locked if no ETL process is selected.
The
batch update
installation process was improved.
The algorithm transfer via GUF was stabilized.
The ability to migrate object types containing attributes with a configured
two-way relation
using updates was improved.
When logging in via LDAP, the ability to create users with the administrator role was debugged.
User permissions verification for registry viewing and creation was improved.
Default permissions for structural groups for the "Comment Marker" type [SYS_RF_COMMENT_MARKER] were removed.
Various security enhancements were implemented in the System.
The date display based on
consolidation wizard
settings was improved.
The ability to delete reporting form lines was restored.
Balance checks
were added when importing reports.
The automatic
calculation of methods
when making manual adjustments was debugged.
The ability to edit templates in the
reporting form import wizard
was restored.
Tahoma
font was added to the list of supported fonts in the document editor.
Text fragment insertion when copying from a *.docx file was improved.
The full-text comparison of versions with footnotes was stabilized.
The generation of printed tabular forms was improved.
The text fragment highlighting in printed forms was improved.
The filling of bookmarks in printed form tables was improved.
The display of the printed form file content was debugged.
The display of warning when opening an executable file was improved.
The message window display during speech recognition was stabilized.
The unread messages counter was adjusted.
The ability to use
meeting organizer tools
was stabilized.
